metadata.title: CVE-2014-3992 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in Dolibarr ERP/CRM 3.5.3 allowremote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1)entity parameter in an update action to user/fiche.php or (2) sortorderparameter to user/group/index.php.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
